data.title: RIOLA SARDO PRAYER TIMES: مواقيت الصلاة
data.meta_description: Riola Sardo Prayer Times - Today Riola Sardo prayer timings are Fajr Time 5:10 AM, Dhuhr Time 1:28 PM, Asr Time 5:12 PM, Maghrib Time 8:08 PM and Isha Time 9:39 PM. Get monthly Riola Sardo salah timings and 7 days accurate Riola Sardo prayer time table.
data.text:
Today Prayer Times Riola Sardo, Italy

Today 25 Aug, 2024, Riola Sardo Namaz Timings are Fajr 5:10 AM, Dhuhr 1:28 PM, Asr 5:12 PM, Maghrib 8:08 PM & Isha 9:39 PM.

The city azan, salat schedule & 7 days time table is also provided. Daily Fajar (Fajr) timing in Riola Sardo, Dhuhur time, Asr time in Riola Sardo, Maghrib Riola Sardo prayer times & Isha Riola Sardo Namaz timing are available. Today's 21 Safar 1446 Riola Sardo namaz timing with next 7 days Schedule from 25 Aug, 2024 to 31 Aug, 2024 with customizable prayer time calculation methods to calculate the proper time for your prayer. On other hand, you may also read Riola Sardo zawal time updates with complete start and end time details.

Today Riola Sardo Sun Set time or Iftar Time in Riola Sardo is 6:47 AM and Dawn break Time or the end of Sehri Time in Riola Sardo is 5:10 AM. Along with Riola Sardo Prayers times you can also read the Riola Sardo Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Hanafi (sunni) or Riola Sardo Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Jafria (shia).

Prayer Timing Customization

By using this option you can change or adjust timing according to your country's prayer calculation methods. These timings are available for all Sunni schools of thought including Hanafi, Shafi, Maliki, and Hanbali.

You may also find here makrooh time updates including Riola Sardo zawal time with complete details start and end time.

Riola Sardo Sun Set time that is also called Iftar Time in Riola Sardo is 8:09 PM and Dawn break Time that is also end of Sehri Time in Riola Sardo at 5:09 AM. Sehri and Iftar time is also called Ramadan Time during the month of Ramadan.

Riola Sardo Prayer Times Today

Prayer Time in Riola Sardo for Sunday 25 Aug 2024 are:

Fajr Time in Riola Sardo: 5:10 AM

Zuhr Time in Riola Sardo: 1:28 PM

Asr Time in Riola Sardo: 5:12 PM

Maghrib Time in Riola Sardo: 8:08 PM

Isha Time in Riola Sardo: 9:39 PM

Q: What is Fajr time in Riola Sardo?

A: Fajr start time in Riola Sardo is at 5:10 AM and end time is 6:47 AM. Fajr consists of 4 Rakats as 2 Farz and 2 Sunnah.

Q: What time is Ishraq in Riola Sardo?

A: Ishraq Namaz Timing in Riola Sardo today starts at 07:02 AM and the end time is 10:07 AM.

Q: What is Zuhr Time in Riola Sardo?

A: Zuhr starting time in Riola Sardo is at 1:28 PM and the ending time is 5:12 PM. Zuhr Salah consists of 12 Rakat, including 4 Sunnah, 4 Farz, 2 Sunnah, and 2 nafl.

Q: What is Asr time in Riola Sardo?

A: Today Asr prayer start time in Riola Sardo is 5:12 PM, and it ends at 8:08 PM. It's an afternoon prayer consisting of 8 Rakat: 4 Sunnat and 4 Farz.

Q: What time is Maghrib in Riola Sardo?

A: Maghrib start time in Riola Sardo is at 8:08 PM, and the maghrib time end is 9:39 PM. It's a sunset prayer consisting of 7 Rakat: 3 Farz, 2 Sunnat, and 2 Nafl.

Q: What is Isha Time in Riola Sardo?

A: Today Isha Namaz time Riola Sardo starts at 9:39 PM and ends time at 5:10 AM. It's a night prayer consisting of 17 Rakat: 4 Sunnah, 4 Fard, 2 Sunnah, 2 Nafl, 3 Witr, and 2 Nafl.
